What to write in a thread
Please Select the best match for the product you are submitting:

Here are some tips to make sure that your new submission is helpful for everyone. 

1. Did you search our forums to make sure its not a repost? 

2. Are you posting in the right forum? 

3. If its a short-duration/daily deal, Please use Daily Deals forum. 

4. If its a coupon/freebie, Please use Coupons and Freebies forum. 

5. Include complete details about the price and savings. 

6. Include detailed information about the product. 

7. If there are any specific steps, to get the deal, please include them.

DesiDime is completely free and user driven online shopping community for the \'Aam Janta\'.\nIt is created to provide a platform for users to Collaborate, make friends and share information in order to make the best shopping decisions. Our objective is to create a community which is created by the users, for the users, to share the best deals available on the net, be it daily deals, special promotions, freebies, coupons, online and in-store deals across India. We want to create a one-stop location when you plan to go shopping!!! We grab the hottest deals in town and make them better by helping you search and find the right things at the right price at the right time. There’s value here for everyone. To make it completely community focussed, we have made a promise to ourselves and to our users that we will never post paid advertisements for the front page deal. We do not sell any products. We only provide information to make your shopping experience fun!!!
Check out more apps by DesiDime

PLEASE READ THESE TERMS OF USE \(\"TERMS\"\) CAREFULLY BEFORE USING WWW.DESIDIME.COM AS IT AFFECTS AND GOVERNS YOUR USE OF THESE WEB SITES AND YOUR LEGAL RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS. In order to use our service, you must read and accept all of the terms and conditions of this agreement and in the Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to be bound by the terms after you read this Agreement, you may not use our service. DesiDime.com is not an online merchant, we are only an online shopping portal that lists deals from other Shopping websites on the internet. We are not responsible, in any way, for any products ordered from our affiliated or non affiliated merchants. You \(the \"Visitor\"\) must carefully read the fine print associated with each offer. All deals, coupons and promotions on this site are subject to change without notice. DesiDime.com does not guarantee or endorse the accuracy of links, coupon codes, or any deals on this site. You agree to comply with all rules, laws and regulations that are applicable to your use of the Web Site, including, without limitation, those governing your transmission or use of any software or data.

Desidime.com provides a collection of online resources, including communication forums, shopping services, search functionality and a business directory(referred to hereafter as "the Service"). The Service is provided by desidime.com, and is subject to the following Terms of Use ("Terms"), which may be updated by desidime.com from time to time. The desidime.com will provide notice of materially significant changes to the Terms by posting notice on the desidime.com homepage. You must be at least 14 years of age to use this Service. By using the Service in any way, you are agreeing to comply with these terms.

By using this website, you understand and accept that all postings, messages, text, files, photos, videos, comments, images, or any such material("Content") posted on, transmitted through, or linked from the Service, are the sole responsibility of the person from whom such Content originated. Similarly, you are solely responsible for all Content that you post. Desidime.com cannot control and is not responsible for any content made available through this website. By using the Service, you may be exposed to Content that is offensive, indecent, inaccurate, misleading, or otherwise objectionable. Further, the desidime.com website and content made available through the service may contain links to other websites. The desidime.com website makes no representation or warranty as to the accuracy, completeness or authenticity of the information contained in any such site. We recommend caution when you link to any other website. The desidime.com site will not be liable for any damage or loss of any kind incurred as a result of use of Content posted, emailed or otherwise made available via the Service. The desidime.com website does not pre-screen or approve any content posted in forums but it has right to delete or move any Content, for violating the Terms or for any other reason deemed appropriate. DesiDime.com generally pre-screens Content posted in Premium Deals section but is not responsible for authenticity or accuracy of such Content.

string.name: third_header
string.u: Third Party Content, Sites and Services

resources.string: The desidime.com website and Content available through the Service may contain features and functionalities that may link you or provide you with access to third party content, which is completely independent of DesiDime, including web sites, directories, servers, networks, systems, information and databases, applications, software, programs, products or services, and the Internet as a whole. Your interactions with organizations and/or individuals found on or through the Service, including payment and delivery of goods or services, and any other terms, conditions, warranties or representations associated with such dealings, are solely between you and such organizations and/or individuals. You should make whatever investigation you feel necessary or appropriate before proceeding with any online or offline transaction with any of these third parties. You agree that DesiDime shall not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as result of any such dealings.If there is a dispute between participants on this site, or between users and any third party, you understand and agree that DesiDime (or Parity Labs) is under no obligation to become involved. In the event that you have a dispute with one or more other users, you hereby release DesiDime (or Parity Labs), its officers, employees, agents and successors in rights from claims, demands and damages (actual and consequential) of every kind or nature, known or unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed and undisclosed, arising out of or in any way related to such disputes and / or our service.
Registration Data and certain other information about you is subject to our Privacy Policy. For more information, please read our full privacy policy.

You will receive a password and account designation upon completing the registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password and account and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account. You agree to (a) immediately notify DesiDime of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security, and (b) DesiDime recommends that you exit from your account at the end of each session if using a public computer. DesiDime cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with maintaining your account and/or password.

You agree to indemnify and hold DesiDime and its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, employees, partners and licensors harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of Content you submit, post, transmit or otherwise make available through the Service, your use of the Service, your connection to the Service, your violation of the TOS, or your violation of any rights of another.
Please report any violations of the TOS to our Customer Support at admin@desidime.com
This TOS is effective as of September 25th, 2010.

Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include a lot of text. If the platform does not provide large-format notifications, this method has no effect. The user will always see the normal notification view.
